Text: Prosecutors allege that players in the scheme misled the state into thinking a stock had multiple owners who were each owed a dividend and a tax credit. Germany estimates such trades cost it more than 5 billion euros in total.
Cause: Prosecutors allege that players in the scheme misled the state into thinking a stock had multiple owners who were each owed a dividend and a tax credit.
Effect: Germany estimates such trades cost it more than 5 billion euros in total.
Sentence: <e1>Prosecutors allege that players in the scheme misled the state into thinking a stock had multiple owners who were each owed a dividend and a tax credit.</e1> <e2>Germany estimates such trades cost it more than 5 billion euros in total.</e2>
